scripts.lint: npm run lint:app && npm run lint:test
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s first 'cross-env NODE_ENV=test node app.js' 'wait-on http://localhost:3033/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --recursive test/e2e/'
scripts.test:e2e-file: concurrently -k -s first 'cross-env NODE_ENV=test node app.js' 'wait-on http://localhost:3033/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha $FILE'
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clear:logs: cat /dev/null > logs/combined.log && cat /dev/null > logs/error.log && cat /dev/null > logs/web_traffic.log
